body: I was playing the walls and was looking at the new kits and saw a cookiemonster kit. I had just the right amount of xp to use it so, I clicked on it and it tolled me that I was not Premium. So, I went to the Avicus shop and it says Gold members have premiums kits.
body_tagged: I was playing the walls and was looking at the new kits and saw a cookiemonster kit. I had just the right amount of xp to use it so, I clicked on it and it tolled me that I was not Premium. So, I went to the Avicus shop and it says Gold members have premiums kits.
title: Premium help

replies.body: Gold unlocks 4 kits cookiemonster is not included in these, emerald however get's  6 kits and they do inckude cookiemonster so that is your problem.
replies.body_tagged: Gold unlocks 4 kits cookiemonster is not included in these, emerald however get's  6 kits and they do inckude cookiemonster so that is your problem.

replies.body:
Maybe it was a glitch.
Because Avicore just came out, I expect many things to have some small glitches.
Try asking AviGill or Howsie22 on Skype, so that they may address the issue to funky.

replies.body: He has to upgrade to emerald to get it.
